AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: scrib trainer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] ran the most prestigious scrib circus in Mournhold. Dozens of Dunmer strolled past every day, completely oblivious to the supposed performance mere metres from them. Of course [PAWN_nameDef] was equally oblivious to the lack of attention, and simply enjoyed watching [PAWN_possessive] scrib thump away.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: netch rancher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked on a netch ranch for many years and suffered many stings during this time, While [PAWN_pronoun] learnt some basic medical skills in the thanks to the endless stream of wounds, [PAWN_nameDef] never learnt how to not annoy a netch.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: guar rancher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] used to work on a guar ranch back in Vvardenfell. Many hours each day were spent herding the guar, whom often wound up getting their oversized heads stuck in strange places. [PAWN_nameDef] also spent most afternoons crafting new pairs of boots, as [PAWN_possessive] boots were often ruined whilst wandering the fields.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: nix hound trainer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] used to own a quaint little hovel in Hla Oad, where [PAWN_pronoun] spent many hours each day training nix hound pups. Either [PAWN_pronoun] was rather good at this, or nix hounds were just that easy to train. Regardless, [PAWN_nameDef] eventually saved up enough drakes to start a new life, outside of that awful swamp.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: pearl diver
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] decided to earn a living diving for pearls. This was easier said than done, as most of the reefs were home to sea serpents. But eventually [PAWN_nameDef] would find enough to make jewellery out of.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: sep adder tamer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: While most Dunmer chose to work with sea adders or reef vipers, assuming they wished to work with serpents at all, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to work with sep adders. Unlike the native serpents of Pyandonea, sep adders aren't exactly used to Dunmer, and don't much care for being prodded with sticks. [PAWN_nameDef] learnt this the hard way, yet still [PAWN_pronoun] persevered.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: thunderbug rancher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked at a small thunderbug ranch. While the meat and chitin of thunderbugs were worth a decent amount, [PAWN_nameDef] was mostly interested in their hearts, and often experimented with them in [PAWN_possessive] spare time.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: wasten coraldale mudcrab farmer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked at one of the finest crab ranches on Pyandonea, for this one specialised in the Wasten Coraldale Mudcrab. The meat of the Wasten Coraldale Mudcrab is considered quite the delicacy by the Dunmer, and [PAWN_nameDef] most certainly sampled some whenever possible.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: silt strider trainer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] once raised silt striders from nymph to adult. It was a long-winded process, as silt strider take a considerable time to reach to adulthood. But at the end of the day, [PAWN_nameDef] got to sit back and relax, listening to the soothing calls of the silt striders.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: slaughterfish breeder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: One day [PAWN_nameDef] decided [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to rule the seas. Of course for most Dunmer, plans such as these would involve forming a pirate crew, or taming a particularly large sea serpent. [PAWN_nameDef] decided to take [PAWN_possessive] plans for oceanic domination in a slightly different direction, and started breeding slaughterfish.\n\nEventually the swarm grew so large that there was no containing it. A few days later [PAWN_nameDef] recieved word that one of Orgnum's prized sea serpents had been devoured. [PAWN_nameDef] took the first ship [PAWN_pronoun] could find.
